name: PM2.5
description: Fine particulate matter that can penetrate deep into the lungs and affect respiratory health.

name: PM10
description: Inhalable particles that can cause breathing issues and aggravate asthma.

name: CO
description: A colorless, odorless gas that reduces oxygen delivery in the body and can be harmful in high concentrations.

name: SO2
description: A pungent gas from burning fossil fuels, which can cause throat irritation and exacerbate lung diseases.

name: O3
description: A reactive gas at ground level that can irritate the lungs and reduce lung function.

name: NO2
description: A gas from vehicles and industry that can irritate airways and worsen respiratory diseases.
